resources.string: This is a simple application to manage your notes in a best way. It saves notes on the basis of categories, means you can manage each category\'s notes seperatly. This app is complete OFFLINE, NO LOGIN and SIGNUP required, just install and start using. It has FILTER option through which you can filter all categories by All Time, Daily, and Weekly. You can REVERSE the list, means last entered category will be on top by applying this option.
